title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM‑KISAN)
description: Provides direct income support of ₹2,000 every 4 months to eligible farmer families via DBT.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance coverage for yield loss due to natural calamities, with quick claim settlement.

title: PM‑KUSUM Scheme
benefit: 60% subsidy on solar pumps; 30% state support; farmer pays 40%
description: Promotes solar-powered irrigation, reducing diesel dependency and enabling sale of extra power.

title: PM‑AASHA (Annadata Aay SanraksHan Abhiyan)
benefit: Ensures government procurement at MSP, paying deficiency amount to farmers.
description: Umbrella scheme to guarantee the minimum support price (MSP) via various procurement channels.

title: e‑NAM (National Agriculture Market)
benefit: Access to 1000+ mandis with transparent online pricing and bidding.
description: Nationwide electronic trading platform for agricultural produce to promote price transparency.

title: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
benefit: Short-term crop loans with interest subsidy + insurance cover.
description: Provides timely credit to farmers at low interest rates along with accidental insurance.
